quizDescription: Test your knowledge of action movies with this thrilling trivia quiz!

questions.question: In the movie 'Die Hard,' what is the name of the protagonist played by Bruce Willis?
questions.explanation: The protagonist played by Bruce Willis in 'Die Hard' is named John McClane.

questions.question: Which action movie features a former Green Beret who must rescue his daughter from human traffickers?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'Taken' features a former Green Beret who must rescue his daughter from human traffickers.

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional secret agent character played by Daniel Craig in the James Bond movies?
questions.explanation: The fictional secret agent character played by Daniel Craig in the James Bond movies is James Bond.

questions.question: Which action movie features a former black-ops operative seeking revenge against his former agency?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'John Wick' features a former black-ops operative seeking revenge against his former agency.

questions.question: In the movie 'Gladiator,' what is the famous line spoken by Russell Crowe's character before entering the arena?
options: I have nothing to declare except my genius.
questions.explanation: In 'Gladiator,' the famous line spoken by Russell Crowe's character before entering the arena is 'Are you not entertained?'

questions.question: Which action movie follows a group of elite soldiers on a mission to stop a madman with a deadly weapon?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'The Expendables' follows a group of elite soldiers on a mission to stop a madman with a deadly weapon.

questions.question: Which action movie features a skilled thief who is coerced into pulling off an impossible heist?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'Inception' features a skilled thief who is coerced into pulling off an impossible heist.

questions.question: What is the name of the highly skilled assassin played by Keanu Reeves in the 'John Wick' movies?
questions.explanation: The highly skilled assassin played by Keanu Reeves in the 'John Wick' movies is named John Wick.

questions.question: Which action movie follows a group of astronauts on a dangerous mission to save Earth from a deadly asteroid?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'Armageddon' follows a group of astronauts on a dangerous mission to save Earth from a deadly asteroid.

questions.question: In the movie 'The Dark Knight,' who portrays the Joker, Batman's arch-nemesis?
questions.explanation: Heath Ledger portrays the Joker, Batman's arch-nemesis, in 'The Dark Knight.'

questions.question: Which action movie follows a team of elite agents known as IMF who take on high-stakes espionage missions?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'Mission: Impossible' follows a team of elite agents known as IMF who take on high-stakes espionage missions.

questions.question: What is the name of the genetically enhanced soldier played by Dwayne Johnson in 'G.I. Joe: Retaliation'?
questions.explanation: The genetically enhanced soldier played by Dwayne Johnson in 'G.I. Joe: Retaliation' is named Roadblock.

questions.question: Which action movie features a retired CIA agent who is pulled back into action to save his kidnapped daughter?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'Man on Fire' features a retired CIA agent who is pulled back into action to save his kidnapped daughter.

questions.question: In the movie 'Mad Max: Fury Road,' what is the name of the main protagonist played by Tom Hardy?
questions.explanation: The main protagonist played by Tom Hardy in 'Mad Max: Fury Road' is Max Rockatansky.

questions.question: Which action movie follows a highly skilled thief who plans heists using elaborate disguises?
questions.explanation: The action movie 'The Italian Job' follows a highly skilled thief who plans heists using elaborate disguises.
